comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Wife of Prince Alexander of Teck who was appointed Governor-General of Canada in 1914. She was Princess Alice of Albany before her marriage. In 1917, she and her husband were commanded to drop their German titles (including Teck) by King George V. He became Duke of Athlone. She lived to the age of 97, as Princess Alice, Countess of Athlone. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Alice,_Countess_of_Athlone
